title: Change name from Verifact to Fountain
body:
We propose to change the name of the protocol and all associated materials and assets from Verifact to Fountain. 

At it's inception, Verifact was created in response to the torrent of misinformation and deceptive content being generated and distributed via the Internet. 

The original utility of the Verifact protocol lay in incentivising contributors to "fact check" pieces of information. Thus acting like a filter for misinformation. 

We believe that Fountain better represents the enhanced vision and mission of being a public record of truth, a source of truth, rather than acting as a filter for misinformation, which was the original conception.
author: 0xc459aad24C2E950780eE0F64b67808F20A939e6d
